sent.orig: Up to day 19, I stop my mind to write diary, this is a morning diary.
sent.trans: 一到了19日，我忍不住又想写一篇日记了，是篇早上日记。

sent.orig: I excerpted one pass age from his diary.
sent.trans: 我从他的日记中节选了一段。

sent.orig: His diary casts light on life in England in the 17th century.
sent.trans: 他的日记描述了17世纪英格兰的生活。

sent.orig: Holocaust: Future essayist Anne Frank receives a diary for her thirteenth birthday.
sent.trans: 1942年的今天，安妮·法兰克（后来的散文家）在她十三岁生日上收到一本日记本。

sent.orig: MISS PRISM. Memory, my dear Cecily, is the diary that we all carry about with us.
sent.trans: 普丽丝姆小姐我亲爱的赛茜丽，记忆就是我们能够随时带在身边的日记。
